name: Dino Date Disaster
description:
So many people! But who will match?

Grab two of them and see if they have the same interests. If so - congratulations, you've found a couple! If no - then you have to keep looking until everybody has found their partner.

Don't be put off by their screams, you just look a bit scary, but they will still go on a date with their dream partner if you find them. 

Controls:
Only Left Mouse Button

Developed within one week by:

Alina Fasen - Programming
Annika Heilmann - 2D & 3D Art
Alexander Nham - Sound Design & 3D Art
Torben Weit - 3D Art & Animation
